title: 2026 budget: Zamfara to spend N87bn on health, N86bn on agric, N65bn on education
description:
Get the latest on Zamfara Governor Dauda Lawal, including the 2026 budget, his firm stance on insecurity, political defections, and key policy updates.

Read More: https://punchng.com/2026-budget-zamfara-to-spend-n87bn-on-health-n86bn-on-agric-n65bn-on-educat…
content:
Zamfara State Governor Dauda Lawal yesterday presented a proposed N861 billion budget for the 2026, planning to spend N87 billion on health, N86 billion on agriculture, and N65 billion on education
